snippet: Prime Minister Wen Jiabao said the government must hold officials more strongly accountable for corruption that occurs on their watch.
abstract: Chinese Prime Min Wen Jiabao issues new call for the government to end a culture of graft; Wen's statement comes as a murder and corruption scandal enveloping former official Bo Xilai continues to snowball.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Wen Jiabao said the government must hold officials more strongly accountable for corruption that occurs on their watch.

headline.seo: China Prime Minister Calls for Corruption Crackdown
headline.main: China Premier Calls for End to Corruption
headline.print_headline: China Premier Calls for End To Corruption
